variables.name: Core Demographics - Sri Lanka
variables.description: Patient demographic variables for Sri Lanka including NIC, districts, provinces, and divisional secretariats
variables.author: Lattice Health Foundation

variables.name: Core Demographics - Australia
variables.description: Patient demographic variables for Australia including Medicare Card Number, states/territories, and Australian address formats
variables.author: Lattice Health Foundation

variables.name: Core Vital Signs
variables.description: Standard vital sign measurements with both metric and imperial unit variants for weight, height, and temperature
variables.author: Lattice Health Foundation

variables.name: Renal Laboratory Panel
variables.description: Laboratory variables for renal function assessment including creatinine, eGFR, BUN, electrolytes, and urinalysis markers
variables.author: Lattice Health Foundation

variables.name: Hematology Laboratory Panel
variables.description: Complete blood count (CBC), iron studies, coagulation panel, and inflammatory markers
variables.author: Lattice Health Foundation

variables.name: Liver Laboratory Panel
variables.description: Liver function tests including hepatocellular enzymes, cholestatic markers, synthetic function, and bilirubin fractions
variables.author: Lattice Health Foundation

variables.name: Lipid Laboratory Panel
variables.description: Complete lipid panel including standard lipid profile, calculated ratios, apolipoproteins, and advanced lipid markers
variables.author: Lattice Health Foundation

variables.name: Cardiovascular Medication Classes
variables.description: Drug class variables for cardiovascular medications using WHO ATC classification - antihypertensives, lipid-lowering agents, antiplatelets, and anticoagulants
variables.author: Lattice Health Foundation

variables.name: Diabetes Medication Classes
variables.description: Drug class variables for diabetes medications using WHO ATC classification - oral hypoglycemics, GLP-1 agonists, SGLT2 inhibitors, and insulins
variables.author: Lattice Health Foundation

screens.name: Patient Registration - Sri Lanka
screens.description: Patient registration screen for Sri Lanka healthcare facilities with NIC validation, district/province selection, and local address formats
screens.author: Lattice Health Foundation

screens.name: Patient Registration - Australia
screens.description: Patient registration screen for Australian healthcare facilities with Medicare/DVA/IHI identifiers, state selection, and indigenous status
screens.author: Lattice Health Foundation

screens.name: Vital Signs Entry
screens.description: Standard vital signs entry screen with blood pressure, heart rate, temperature, weight, height, BMI, SpO2, and respiratory rate
screens.author: Lattice Health Foundation

screens.name: Renal Panel Entry
screens.description: Laboratory result entry screen for renal function tests including creatinine, eGFR, electrolytes, and urinalysis markers
screens.author: Lattice Health Foundation

screens.name: Hematology Panel Entry
screens.description: Laboratory result entry screen for hematology tests including CBC, iron studies, coagulation, and inflammatory markers
screens.author: Lattice Health Foundation

screens.name: Liver Panel Entry
screens.description: Laboratory result entry screen for liver function tests including enzymes, bilirubin, synthetic function, and hepatitis serology
screens.author: Lattice Health Foundation

screens.name: Lipid Panel Entry
screens.description: Laboratory result entry screen for lipid profile including cholesterol, triglycerides, apolipoproteins, and advanced markers
screens.author: Lattice Health Foundation
